page.title: 04SPORTS FACILITIES IN UPTON
page.content: {COUNTY OFFICERS SPORTS CENTRE}USED BY AN AVERAGE OF 1500 PEOPLE PER WEEK IS OPEN TO MEMBERS OR GUESTS.USERS ARE MAINLY OVER 18 AND PAY A FEE OF Â£3 ANUALLY.IT PROVIDES FACILITIES FOR MOST SPORTS EXCEPT SWIMMING.{ UPTON {GOLF CLUB,}OPENED1934 HAS 550 MEMBERS INCLUDING 60 JUNIORS AND 150 LADIES. THE ANNUAL SUBSCRIPTIONIS Â£200. MAINTENANCE COSTS ARE HIGH AS 14 GROUNDSMEN ARE EMPLOYED AND MACHINES AND FERTILIZERS NEEDED FOR THE GRASS ARE EXPENSIVE.A PROFESSIONAL COACH ALSO SELLS GOLF EQUIPMENT.THE CLUB HOUSE HAS A RESTAURANT AND BAR. { {WEALSTONE LANE SPORTS FIELD}HAS TENNIS COURTS,BOWLING GREENS,A PITCH AND PUTT COURSE AND A PLAY AREA FOR CHILDREN .{ {QUIDS INN}IS A PUB. IT HAS OVER 200 VISITORS EACH DAY.BITTER IS THE FAVOURITE OF THE 85 DRINKS SOLD.THEY HAVE DART,DOMINO AND BOWLING TEAMS.
